title: Remote Job Applications Specialist
job_overview:
Responsibilities:
Apply to 20–35 remote marketing jobs per day using provided resume variants and cover letter templates

Use LinkedIn, Otta, Greenhouse, Lever, and other platforms to find and apply to relevant jobs

Match each job posting to the most relevant resume variant (Google Ads / Paid Social / Full Funnel)

Tailor basic messaging (e.g., intro note or Easy Apply message) using AI (ChatGPT or provided scripts)

Track each job application in Google Sheets or Airtable with status and notes

Flag promising job responses or interview invites for follow-up

Research and log company career pages that are hiring for relevant roles

Occasionally assist with light email or cold outreach using provided templates (optional)

Communicate progress via Slack or email 1–2x/week

???? Requirements:
Strong written English

Experience with Google Sheets, LinkedIn, and basic AI tools (ChatGPT or TealHQ)

Highly detail-oriented and organized

Reliable internet and ability to work independently

Prior experience with job application support or executive VA work is a plus

????? Tools You’ll Use:
Google Sheets (application tracker)

ChatGPT (for message generation and job tailoring)

LinkedIn, Otta, AngelList, Wellfound

Gmail or Smartlead (optional for outreach)

Resume and SOP templates (we will provide)

???? Success Metrics:
100–150 high-quality job applications submitted per week

Daily logs maintained with full details

Minimal errors in job targeting and resume matching

Quick alerts on any replies or interview opportunities
